metadata.description: Epic fantasy like-manga with a RPG based structure. The setting is a Greece “techno-Byzantine” is moving a mysterious menacing swarm. Winged creatures from east threaten the peace of this kingdom, slaughtering anything that comes between them and their goal. Alonisso’s nightmares seem to be somehow connected to these mysterious enemies. But not even the wise Auraki seems know.
metadata.name: Mediterranea
